titles.title: Stephanie Tubbs Jones Uterine Fibroid Research and Education Act of 2025
Stephanie Tubbs Jones Uterine Fibroid Research and Education Act of 2025
A bill to provide for research and education with respect to uterine fibroids, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
